title: Calories in In-N-Out 4x4 Burger
meta_description: Discover in n out 4x4 calories: about 1090 kcal per burger, plus full macros, protein, fat, sodium details, and tweaks like protein style.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out 4x4 burger: 4 beef patties, 4 cheese slices, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread, toasted bun; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and custom orders. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for updates.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out 4x4 burger has ~1090 kcal, 67 g protein, and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.a: Approximately 1090 kcal for the standard burger.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an In-N-Out 4x4?
faqs.a: About 67 g protein from the four patties.

faqs.q: Is the In-N-Out 4x4 high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 2440 mg sodium due to cheese, spread, and bun.
Roughly 700 kcal without the bun, focusing on patties and veggies.

faqs.q: How does 4x4 compare to Double-Double calories?
faqs.a: 4x4 has ~1090 kcal vs. ~670 kcal for Double-Double; double the patties and cheese.
